org.grouplens.lenskit.mf.funksvd

Class FunkSVDModelBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.mf.funksvd.FunkSVDModelBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.inject.Provider<FunkSVDModel>

    public class FunkSVDModelBuilder
extends Object
implements javax.inject.Provider<FunkSVDModel>
    SVD recommender builder using gradient descent (Funk SVD). This recommender builder constructs an SVD-based recommender using gradient descent, as pioneered by Simon Funk. It also incorporates the regularizations Funk did. These are documented in Netflix Update: Try This at Home. This implementation is based in part on Timely Development's sample code.
    Author:
    GroupLens Research

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public FunkSVDModel get()

      • computeTrailingValue

        protected double computeTrailingValue(int feature)
        Compute the trailing value to assume after a feature. The default implementation assumes all remaining features containing initialValue, returning (featureCount - feature - 1) * initialValue * initialValue. This is used by the default implementation of trainFeature(int, TrainingEstimator, double[], double[], FeatureInfo.Builder).
        Parameters:
        feature - The feature number.
        Returns:
        The trailing value to assume.

      • trainFeature

        protected void trainFeature(int feature,
                TrainingEstimator estimates,
                double[] ufvs,
                double[] ifvs,
                FeatureInfo.Builder fib)
        Train a feature using a collection of ratings. This method iteratively calls doFeatureIteration(TrainingEstimator, FastCollection, double[], double[], double) to train the feature. It can be overridden to customize the feature training strategy.
        Parameters:
        feature - The number of the current feature.
        estimates - The current estimator. This method is not expected to update the estimator.
        ufvs - The user feature values. This has been initialized to the initial value, and may be reused between features.
        ifvs - The item feature values. This has been initialized to the initial value, and may be reused between features.
        fib - The feature info builder. This method is only expected to add information about its training rounds to the builder; the caller takes care of feature number and summary data.
        See Also:
        #doFeatureIteration(TrainingEstimator, FastCollection, double[], double[], double)}, #summarizeFeature(double[], double[], FeatureInfo.Builder)}

      • doFeatureIteration

        protected double doFeatureIteration(TrainingEstimator estimates,
                        FastCollection<IndexedPreference> ratings,
                        double[] ufvs,
                        double[] ifvs,
                        double trail)
        Do a single feature iteration.
        Parameters:
        estimates - The estimates.
        ratings - The ratings to train on.
        ufvs - The user feature values.
        ifvs - The item feature values.
        trail - The trailing values.
        Returns:
        The RMSE of the feature iteration.

        Parameters:
